content.webTitle: Squad sheets: West Ham United v Nottingham Forest

fields.headline: Squad sheets: West Ham United v Nottingham Forest
fields.bodyText: Avram Grant's side are still recovering from the deflation of elimination from the Carling Cup and will hardly relish the visit of a side so resurgent in the Championship. Forest are a point off the automatic promotion places and have five successive wins in all competitions, and arrive unbeaten since November. With West Ham still bottom of the Premier League, that Forest have won only once at Upton Park since 1986 hardly feels relevant, though their hosts may be relieved at Billy Davies's suggestion that some of his key players will be rested. Both these clubs have other priorities. Dominic Fifield Venue Upton Park, Sunday 2pm Ref M Oliver Odds West Ham 21-17 Nottm Forest 11-4 Draw 5-2 Head to head West Ham 43 Nottm Forest 43 Draws 26 West Ham Subs from Boffin, Gabbidon, Reid, Sears, Nouble, Faubert, Dyer, Ba, McCarthy, Obinna, Stanislas, Spector Doubtful Ba Cup-tied O'Neil Nottm Forest Subs from Smith, Anderson, Chambers, Lynch, Majewski, Tyson, McGoldrick, Earnshaw, Moussi Doubtful None Match pointers These side have not met since the 2004-05 season when they were in the Championship. West Ham have not been knocked out by a club from a lower division since 1999.
